abouts.title: About Me
abouts.intro: Hello, my name is Ahmadaliyev Zafarbek and I am 17 years old. I was born in 2008 and started learning programming in 2025. First, I learned Frontend and Google Sheets applications.
abouts.skills: I mainly develop web applications using React, Tailwind CSS, and other advanced technologies. My goal is to create fast and convenient user interfaces on websites while maintaining a balance between design and functionality.
abouts.learning: Currently, I am learning Backend development and working with Figma. In the future, I want to create applications that benefit people.
abouts.contact: If you have questions, my Telegram contact is:
